scripts.preinstall: node -e "const v=process.version.slice(1).split('.');if(parseInt(v[0])<22||(parseInt(v[0])===22&&parseInt(v[1])<0)){console.error('âŒ Node.js version 22.x is required. Current version:',process.version);console.error('Please switch to Node.js 22 using: nvm use');process.exit(1);}"
scripts.pre-push: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run build
